title: Real Simple Linear Patchwork Comforter Set at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Give your bed a fresh new look with the Real Simple Linear Patchwork Comforter Set. Subtle and chic its exceptional patchwork matelassé creates an intricate texture that draws the eye to the top of the bed while the color is sophisticated and soothing. Thanks for watching.
transcripts:
The Linear Patchwork Comforter and Bedding Collection by Real Simple was designed exclusively for Bed Bath & Beyond. The first layer of the bed begins with the Euro shams. The Euro shams add an ideal backdrop to the bed. They are 100% cotton with a textured stripe. The Linear Patchwork Comforter and Pillow Shams have a textured stripe with a subtle patchwork pattern in your choice of aqua, gray, white, or stone. 

The coordinating pillow shams are finished with this same textured pattern and patchwork design. The decorative pillows accenting this bed suite are a square knit pillow in white, gray, aqua, or stone, a square pillow with a faux crochet in 100% cotton, and an oblong 100% cotton pleated pillow. The pillows add the key fashion elements to complete this bed look. The Linear Patchwork Comforter and Bedding Collection is part of the Real Simple collection. It is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath & Beyond stores.
